20110129115211.000|20110129115214.000|CC1|ON THIS, CAUTIOUS OF THE FUTURE 
20110129115214.000|20110129115216.000|CC1|OF THE NATION, THAT INCIDENTS   
20110129115216.000|20110129115218.000|CC1|THAT TOOK PLACE TODAY AND THE   
20110129115218.000|20110129115224.000|CC1|PAST FEW DAYS, HAVE LEFT THE    
20110129115224.000|20110129115226.000|CC1|MAJORITY OF THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE 
20110129115226.000|20110129115229.000|CC1|FFEARING FOR EGYPT AND ITS      
20110129115229.000|20110129115232.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110129115232.000|20110129115235.000|CC1|WE WILL BE CAUTIOUS OF FURTHER  
20110129115235.000|20110129115236.000|CC1|MESDAMES, CHAOS, AND THE        
20110129115236.000|20110129115241.000|CC1|DESTRUCTION.                    
20110129115241.000|20110129115243.000|CC1|I AM SHOULDERING MY FIRST       
20110129115243.000|20110129115246.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY TO MAINTAIN THE  
20110129115246.000|20110129115247.000|CC1|HOMELAND SECURITY AND THE       
20110129115247.000|20110129115251.000|CC1|CITIZENS' SAFETY, CANNOT        
20110129115251.000|20110129115252.000|CC1|TOLERATE OR ALLOW THIS FEAR TO  
20110129115252.000|20110129115257.000|CC1|GRIP OUR PEOPLE AND THEREFORE, I
20110129115257.000|20110129115301.000|CC1|WOULD NOT ALLOW THIS TO HAUNT   
20110129115301.000|20110129115303.000|CC1|OUR FUTURE AND OUR FAITH.       
20110129115303.000|20110129115306.000|CC1|I HAVE REQUESTED THE GOVERNMENT 
20110129115306.000|20110129115309.000|CC1|TO STEP DOWN TODAY AND I WILL   
20110129115309.000|20110129115315.000|CC1|DESIGNATE A NEW GOVERNMENT AS OF
20110129115315.000|20110129115319.000|CC1|TOMORROW TO SHOULDER NEW DUTIES 
20110129115319.000|20110129115321.000|CC1|AND TO ACCOUNT FOR THE          
20110129115321.000|20110129115324.000|CC1|PRIORITIES OF THE UPCOMING ERA. 
20110129115324.000|20110129115326.000|CC1|I STATE ONCE AGAIN THAT I WILL  
20110129115326.000|20110129115330.000|CC1|NOT BE LAX OR TOLERANT.         
20110129115330.000|20110129115333.000|CC1|I WILL TAKE ALL THE STEPS TO    
20110129115333.000|20110129115334.000|CC1|MAINTAIN THE SAFETY AND SECURITY
20110129115334.000|20110129115336.000|CC1|OF ALL AGES.                    
20110129115336.000|20110129115339.000|CC1|I WILL SAFEGUARD THE SAFETY OF  
20110129115339.000|20110129115341.000|CC1|EGYPT AND THE ASPIRATIONS OF OUR
20110129115341.000|20110129115341.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129115341.000|20110129115344.000|CC1|IT IS THE DUTY AND              
20110129115344.000|20110129115346.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY FOR WHICH I HAVE 
20110129115346.000|20110129115348.000|CC1|TAKEN THE OATH TO SAFEGUARD AND 
20110129115348.000|20110129115350.000|CC1|MAINTAIN.                       
20110129115350.000|20110129115353.000|CC1|MAY GOD SAVE EGYPT, ITS PEOPLE, 
20110129115353.000|20110129115358.000|CC1|AND MADE IT CAN GUIDE US, AND   
20110129115358.000|20110129115358.000|CC1|MAY PEACE BE UPON YOU ALL.      
20110129115358.000|20110129115402.000|CC1|>> FOLLOWING THE SPEECH,        
20110129115402.000|20110129115403.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA ALSO SPOKE,     
20110129115403.000|20110129115405.000|CC1|SAYING THAT PRESIDENT MUBARAK   
20110129115405.000|20110129115406.000|CC1|NEEDS TO FOLLOW THROUGH ON      
20110129115406.000|20110129115407.000|CC1|PROMISES OF REFORM.             
20110129115407.000|20110129115409.000|CC1|THEIR REMARKS ARE ABOUT FIVE    
20110129115409.000|20110129115417.000|CC1|MINUTES.                        
20110129115417.000|20110129115418.000|CC1|-- THE REMARKS ARE ABOUT FIVE   
20110129115418.000|20110129115421.000|CC1|MINUTES.                        
20110129115421.000|20110129115427.000|CC1|>> GOOD EVENING, EVERYBODY.     
20110129115427.000|20110129115428.000|CC1|MY ADMINISTRATION HAS BEEN      
20110129115428.000|20110129115430.000|CC1|CLOSELY MONITORING THE SITUATION
20110129115430.000|20110129115430.000|CC1|IN EGYPT.                       
20110129115430.000|20110129115432.000|CC1|I KNOW THAT WE WILL BE LEARNING 
20110129115432.000|20110129115436.000|CC1|MORE TOMORROW WHEN DAYBREAKS.   
20110129115436.000|20110129115438.000|CC1|AS THE SITUATION CONTINUES TO   
20110129115438.000|20110129115441.000|CC1|UNFOLD, OUR FIRST CONCERN IS    
20110129115441.000|20110129115443.000|CC1|PREVENTING INJURY AND LOSS OF   
20110129115443.000|20110129115445.000|CC1|LIFE.                           
20110129115445.000|20110129115446.000|CC1|I WANT TO BE VERY CLEAR IN      
20110129115446.000|20110129115447.000|CC1|CALLING UPON THE EGYPTIAN       
20110129115447.000|20110129115451.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES TO REFRAIN FROM ANY 
20110129115451.000|20110129115452.000|CC1|VIOLENCE AGAINST PEACEFUL       
20110129115452.000|20110129115454.000|CC1|PROTESTERS.                     
20110129115454.000|20110129115458.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE OF EGYPT HAVE RIGHTS 
20110129115458.000|20110129115500.000|CC1|THAT ARE UNIVERSAL, THAT        
20110129115500.000|20110129115502.000|CC1|INCLUDES THE RIGHT TO PEACEFUL  
20110129115502.000|20110129115503.000|CC1|ASSEMBLY AND ASSOCIATION, THE   
20110129115503.000|20110129115505.000|CC1|RIGHT TO FREE SPEECH, AND THE   
20110129115505.000|20110129115507.000|CC1|ABILITY TO DETERMINE THEIR OWN  
20110129115507.000|20110129115508.000|CC1|DESTINY.                        
20110129115508.000|20110129115510.000|CC1|THESE ARE HUMAN RIGHTS AND THE  
20110129115510.000|20110129115511.000|CC1|UNITED STATES WILL STAND UP FOR 
20110129115511.000|20110129115513.000|CC1|THEM EVERYWHERE.                
20110129115513.000|20110129115516.000|CC1|I ALSO CALL UPON THE EGYPTIAN   
20110129115516.000|20110129115517.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT TO REVERSE THE       
20110129115517.000|20110129115518.000|CC1|ACTIONS THEY HAVE TAKEN TO      
20110129115518.000|20110129115520.000|CC1|INTERFERE WITH ACCESS TO THE    
20110129115520.000|20110129115522.000|CC1|INTERNET, THE CELL PHONE SERVICE
20110129115522.000|20110129115524.000|CC1|AND SOCIAL NETWORKS THAT DO SO  
20110129115524.000|20110129115526.000|CC1|MUCH TO CONNECT PEOPLE IN THE   
20110129115526.000|20110129115527.000|CC1|21ST CENTURY.                   
20110129115527.000|20110129115529.000|CC1|AT THE SAME TIME, THOSE         
20110129115529.000|20110129115532.000|CC1|PROTESTING IN THE STREETS HAVE A
20110129115532.000|20110129115532.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY TO EXPRESS       
20110129115532.000|20110129115535.000|CC1|THEMSELVES PEACEFULLY.          
20110129115535.000|20110129115536.000|CC1|VIOLENCE AND DESTRUCTION WILL   
20110129115536.000|20110129115538.000|CC1|NOT LEAD TO THE REFORMS THEY    
20110129115538.000|20110129115540.000|CC1|SEEK.                           
20110129115540.000|20110129115542.000|CC1|I AM GOING FORWARD AT THIS      
20110129115542.000|20110129115545.000|CC1|MOMENT OF VOLATILITY, THIS HAS  
20110129115545.000|20110129115547.000|CC1|TO BE TURNED INTO A MOMENT OF   
20110129115547.000|20110129115547.000|CC1|PROMISE.                        
20110129115547.000|20110129115549.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES HAS A CLOSE   
20110129115549.000|20110129115551.000|CC1|PARTNERSHIP WITH EGYPT AND WE   
20110129115551.000|20110129115553.000|CC1|HAVE COOPERATED ON MANY ISSUES  
20110129115553.000|20110129115554.000|CC1|INCLUDING WORKING TOGETHER TO   
20110129115554.000|20110129115556.000|CC1|ADVANCE IN MORE PEACEFUL REGION.
20110129115556.000|20110129115558.000|CC1|WE HAVE ALSO BEEN CLEAR THAT    
20110129115558.000|20110129115601.000|CC1|THERE MUST BE REFORMED.         
20110129115601.000|20110129115606.000|CC1| , POLITICAL SOCIAL AND         
20110129115606.000|20110129115607.000|CC1|ECONOMICAL THAT MEET THE        
20110129115607.000|20110129115609.000|CC1|ASPIRATIONS OF THE EGYPTIAN     
20110129115609.000|20110129115609.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129115609.000|20110129115611.000|CC1|IN THE ABSENCE OF THESE         
20110129115611.000|20110129115613.000|CC1|REFORMS, GRIEVANCES HAVE BUILT  
20110129115613.000|20110129115615.000|CC1|UP OVER TIME.                   
20110129115615.000|20110129115616.000|CC1|WHEN PRESIDENT MUBARAK ADDRESSED
20110129115616.000|20110129115617.000|CC1|TO THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE TONIGHT, 
20110129115617.000|20110129115620.000|CC1|HE PLEDGED IT A BETTER DEMOCRACY
20110129115620.000|20110129115624.000|CC1|AND GREATER OPPORTUNITY.        
20110129115624.000|20110129115626.000|CC1|I JUST SPOKE TO HIM AFTER HIS   
20110129115626.000|20110129115628.000|CC1|SPEECH AND I TOLD HIM THAT HE   
20110129115628.000|20110129115629.000|CC1|HAS A RESPONSIBILITY TO GIVE    
20110129115629.000|20110129115632.000|CC1|MEANING TO THOSE WORDS, TO TAKE 
20110129115632.000|20110129115634.000|CC1|CONCRETE STEPS AND ACTIONS THAT 
20110129115634.000|20110129115637.000|CC1|DELIVER ON THAT PROMISE.        
20110129115637.000|20110129115639.000|CC1|VIOLENCE WILL NOT ADDRESS THE   
20110129115639.000|20110129115640.000|CC1|GRIEVANCES OF THE EGYPTIAN      
20110129115640.000|20110129115642.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129115642.000|20110129115643.000|CC1|SUPPRESSING IDEAS NEVER SUCCEED 
20110129115643.000|20110129115645.000|CC1|IN MAKING THEM GO AWAY.         
20110129115645.000|20110129115647.000|CC1|WHAT IS NEEDED RIGHT NOW ARE    
20110129115647.000|20110129115649.000|CC1|CONCRETE STEPS THAT ADVANCE THE 
20110129115649.000|20110129115652.000|CC1|RIGHTS OF THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE, A
20110129115652.000|20110129115653.000|CC1|MEANINGFUL DIALOGUE BETWEEN THE 
20110129115653.000|20110129115656.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT AND ITS CITIZENS AND 
20110129115656.000|20110129115658.000|CC1|A PATH OF POLITICAL CHANGE THAT 
20110129115658.000|20110129115700.000|CC1|LEADS TO A FUTURE OF GREATER    
20110129115700.000|20110129115702.000|CC1|FREEDOM AND GREATER OPPORTUNITY 
20110129115702.000|20110129115703.000|CC1|AND JUSTICE FOR THE EGYPTIAN    
20110129115703.000|20110129115706.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129115706.000|20110129115708.000|CC1|ULTIMATELY, THE FUTURE OF EGYPT 
20110129115708.000|20110129115709.000|CC1|WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE       
20110129115709.000|20110129115711.000|CC1|EGYPTIAN PEOPLE.                
20110129115711.000|20110129115712.000|CC1|I BELIEVE THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE   
20110129115712.000|20110129115715.000|CC1|WANT THE SAME THINGS THAT WE ALL
20110129115715.000|20110129115716.000|CC1|WANT, A BETTER LIFE FOR         
20110129115716.000|20110129115718.000|CC1|OURSELVES AND OUR CHILDREN, AND 
20110129115718.000|20110129115720.000|CC1|A GOVERNMENT THAT IS FAIR AND   
20110129115720.000|20110129115722.000|CC1|JUST AND RESPONSIVE.            
20110129115722.000|20110129115725.000|CC1|PUT SIMPLY, THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE 
20110129115725.000|20110129115728.000|CC1|WANT A FUTURE THAT THE FITS THE 
20110129115728.000|20110129115729.000|CC1|HEIRS TO A GREAT AND ASIAN      
20110129115729.000|20110129115731.000|CC1|CIVILIZATION.                   
20110129115731.000|20110129115732.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES ALWAYS WILL BE
20110129115732.000|20110129115734.000|CC1|A PARTNER IN PURSUIT OF THAT    
20110129115734.000|20110129115736.000|CC1|FUTURE AND WE ARE COMMITTED TO  
20110129115736.000|20110129115737.000|CC1|WORKING WITH THE EGYPTIAN       
20110129115737.000|20110129115738.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT AND THE EGYPTIAN     
20110129115738.000|20110129115742.000|CC1|PEOPLE, ALL QUARTERS, TO ACHIEVE
20110129115742.000|20110129115743.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110129115743.000|20110129115746.000|CC1|AROUND THE WORLD, GOVERNMENTS   
20110129115746.000|20110129115748.000|CC1|HAVE AN OBLIGATION TO RESPOND TO
20110129115748.000|20110129115749.000|CC1|THEIR CITIZENS.                 
20110129115749.000|20110129115752.000|CC1|THAT IS TRUE HERE IN THE UNITED 
20110129115752.000|20110129115752.000|CC1|STATES.                         
20110129115752.000|20110129115753.000|CC1|THAT IS TRUE IN ASIA.           
20110129115753.000|20110129115755.000|CC1|THAT IS TRUE IN EUROPE.         
20110129115755.000|20110129115757.000|CC1|THAT IS TRUE IN AFRICA AND IT IS
20110129115757.000|20110129115758.000|CC1|CERTAINLY TRUE IN THE ARAB      
20110129115758.000|20110129115800.000|CC1|WORLD.                          
20110129115800.000|20110129115802.000|CC1| WHERE A NEW GENERATION OF      
20110129115802.000|20110129115803.000|CC1|CITIZENS HAS THE RIGHT TO BE    
20110129115803.000|20110129115804.000|CC1|HEARD.                          
20110129115804.000|20110129115806.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS IN CAIRO SHORTLY     
20110129115806.000|20110129115809.000|CC1|AFTER I WAS ELECTED PRESIDENT, I
20110129115809.000|20110129115811.000|CC1|SAID THAT ALL GOVERNMENTS MUST  
20110129115811.000|20110129115814.000|CC1|MAINTAIN POWER THROUGH CONSENT, 
20110129115814.000|20110129115815.000|CC1|NOT COERCION.                   
20110129115815.000|20110129115817.000|CC1|THAT IS THE SINGLE STANDARD BY  
20110129115817.000|20110129115819.000|CC1|WHICH THE PEOPLE OF EGYPT WILL  
20110129115819.000|20110129115822.000|CC1|ACHIEVE THE FUTURE THEY DESERVE.
20110129115822.000|20110129115824.000|CC1|SURELY, THERE WILL BE DIFFICULT 
20110129115824.000|20110129115825.000|CC1|DAYS TO COME BUT THE UNITED     
20110129115825.000|20110129115826.000|CC1|STATES WILL CONTINUE TO STAND UP
20110129115826.000|20110129115829.000|CC1|FOR THE RIGHTS OF THE EGYPTIAN  
20110129115829.000|20110129115830.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND WORK WITH THEIR      
20110129115830.000|20110129115832.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IN PURSUIT OF A      
20110129115832.000|20110129115834.000|CC1|FUTURE THAT IS MORE JUST, MORE  
20110129115834.000|20110129115835.000|CC1|FREE, AND MORE HOPEFUL.         
20110129115835.000|20110129115838.000|CC1|THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
